title: Konami Denies Hideo Kojima Has Left, Says He's "On Vacation"
text:
Konami Denies Hideo Kojima Has Left, Says He's "On Vacation" 
Published By: Kotaku.com - Today 
Earlier today, The New Yorker published a story reporting that Metal Gear Solid creator Hideo Kojima parted ways with Konami earlier this mo...
